(:action collect ; Collect an item from a location and update its state
    :parameters (?item - object ?loc - location)
    :precondition (and
      (at ?item ?loc)
      (available ?item)
    )
    :effect (and
      (collected ?item)
      (not (at ?item ?loc))

(:action make ; Create or transform an entity
  :parameters (?npc - person ?item - object ?location - place)
  :precondition (and (obtained ?item) (at ?npc ?location) (not (made ?item)))
  :effect (made ?item)
)
